title: Bug: DistributedDataParallel deadlock even after setting multiprocessing start method to 'spawn'
body_html:
Hi,

Im trying to use DistributedDataParallel along with DataLoader with num_workers > 1. As described in the documentation, Im setting the multiprocessing start method to 'spawn' (I tried 'forkserver' as well), and still Im experiencing deadlock. Can anybody help pls as Im struggling several months with this and I cannot get an official answer?
